detectors.description: Airdrop.claimTokens(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__4.sol#211-220) ignores return value by token.transfer(owner,_claimedBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Airdrop__4.sol#218)
